biotools.summary: ASCoVPred is a machine learning-based platform for quantitative prediction of anti-SARS-CoV-2 activity and human cell toxicity of molecules. ASCoVPred is a collection of compounds descriptors / fingerprints (FPs) calculator tool (PaDEL v2.21) and different machine learning (ML) algorithms (implemented in Weka v3.8.2) that are used to build the ML-based quantitative structure-activity relationship (QSAR) prediction models. These QSAR models can be used for ML-assisted prediction of anti-SARS-CoV-2 activity and human cell toxicity of compounds.
